title: future

tags.description: Become a master in JavaScript frameworks

description: I aim to master web development and UX/UI design, focusing on emerging technologies like Web3 and AI. I envision working at an innovative company where I can grow with the industry, embracing new challenges. My goal is to continuously improve, stay updated with web development trends, and wake up excited to create and contribute each day.

title: present

tags.description: Graduated with a BS in Computer Science
Learned Data Structures, Algorithms & Complexity, & Object-Oriented Programming

description: I recently graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, discovering my passion for web development and design. I am currently enhancing my skills in CSS, JavaScript, and React while working on personal projects on GitHub. I meticulously refine my work to create intuitive designs and love bringing ideas to life through clean code. My goal is to grow as a web developer and designer, specializing in intuitive user interfaces and performance optimization.

title: past
description: I started my career as a Group Underwriter at a health insurance company, later transitioning to a Data Analyst role. My curiosity about improving workflows led me to learn VBA and create user-friendly interfaces to optimize Excel tools. This sparked my passion for blending creativity with technical skills. A colleague introduced me to Front-End development, solidifying my decision to pursue Computer Science and shaping my problem-solving approach to web development.
